CustomField.formula: CASE(Campaign_Follow_Up__c, "", "Archived", "Not Going to Follow Up", "Archived", "Expired - No Action","Archived", "Expired - Sent EM / Left VM", "Archived", "Communicated With", IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >DATE(2012, 12, 31) ,"Tracked","Archived"), "Closed by Owner", IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >DATE(2012, 12, 31) ,"Tracked","Archived"),"Tracked" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tracks open tasks plus "Communicated With" in the current half
CustomField.label: Marketing Tracked Task
